016236ba7563e3b1.voiceContent: Peaceful and comforting, enough for one to forget the time while pouring oneself into research

0a413aed86b19759.voiceContent: Good night. May you have sweet dreams

0cfcb61a453d6644.voiceContent: Uh... I will let you decide the topic of our conversation

13f3f9e697b47e58.voiceContent: Thank you. I'll guarantee your safety, as I've done before

1f06cba0a7902e47.voiceContent: Initially, it was for research purposes. I originally tried to reproduce subjects with a rubbing technique

33afd78f9a99692d.voiceContent: After that, I tried to learn how to draw

38fdaa874914e983.voiceContent: I will often sketch my surroundings. Your arrangements in this realm also provide a source of inspiration for me

43255ff85b85becd.voiceContent: Hmm, I believe that you must have acquired some sort of secret art that allows you to copy things from the real world, is this not so

4d526b6d4a550bcb.voiceContent: But after meeting you, I'd rather spend my time on you than other matters

4e7b977ef4d5c325.voiceContent: And not just for these, but for many other things

616fe7e1a08bf801.voiceContent: So can you also... give me more of your time

618159b55e29c66b.voiceContent: #Morning, {NICKNAME}. I've already organized my next stage of research objectives

61ffb00c4bbbb7ed.voiceContent: You can use your own hands to unearth unknown secrets and ultimately master new knowledge

6752e00e4a802c53.voiceContent: Would you mind... if I make you the subject matter of my sketch

6be2cc1ff7e5534d.voiceContent: A fascinating copy... You have attended to every fine detail â€” even the feeling of the wilderness that one can only experience when adventuring themselves

75c75db95ce38be0.voiceContent: Yes, this is a habit that I formed a long time ago

7b14e8b10b5e918e.voiceContent: Hm, I believe that the utopia referenced in literature would likely resemble this place

7e6ad034bc0ba9c9.voiceContent: But now... it seems that there is more to it

7e7e07cc0c1924df.voiceContent: We already understand each other quite well, don't we

963609d56b616a3a.voiceContent: By the way, after we're done, may I have the pleasure of inviting you to dessert with me

9d630ce4bd487af6.voiceContent: ...You don't require me to read you a bedtime story, do you

a3dcdd85ff7aa354.voiceContent: Speaking of which... I used to think interaction with others was a waste of time

a5060997a9fb5ab6.voiceContent: It's good for both drawing and experiments

b4a4cbce106a81f4.voiceContent: But should you have other arrangements, I don't necessarily mind revising my plans

b59443fd153ac273.voiceContent: Hmm, if you ask me, the world is a limitless library

bd0e41eef1ae4dca.voiceContent: This is a nice workshop. Looks like I will be able to continue my research here as well

c4cbbd9878fcf49c.voiceContent: While refining my artistic skills, I unconsciously found myself engrossed in drawing

c95ba9aa26621bbe.voiceContent: However, the results were inadequate and lacked spirit

cd54bf1ddc464aac.voiceContent: I heard the sound of footsteps from afar, and here you are

d09b363bc3f97308.voiceContent: At first, it was because you carry the aura of the stars

d441460139e94a3c.voiceContent: If you don't mind, I'd like to conduct some further research with you. Perhaps it may be of some help to you

d561424d718c607a.voiceContent: Why is this? Give me some time and I can conduct experiments to find out

dc508e571e6def80.voiceContent: Hm... Let your creative instincts run unabated, and I should be quite content

e5cbae168e0de24a.voiceContent: Alright then. I'll go ahead and start sketching

ef113bcbef453103.voiceContent: To continue our time together, and to thank you for your company

f40a7976c614df02.voiceContent: This is a unique anomaly. I think I likely know the reason why

f68196152d026c5c.voiceContent: There's a multitude of research topics for experiments..

f7ab8226d7846a7e.voiceContent: This sort of feeling is captivating

fe17eb8e2e0ddc1f.voiceContent: In your company, I never lack inspiration

1586a24852621a38.voiceContent: No need to be discouraged. You just need to adjust your approach

261edabc27fd0454.voiceContent: The soil is moist, ideal for collecting the roots of Boom Blossoms. No please, allow me to handle this

2b299727169fe652.voiceContent: Hmm... Besides research, the activity I spend most of my time on is probably sketching. At first I saw it simply as a way to better study the structure of living things and materials so as to aid me in my experiments, but it eventually became a hobby of mine. Indeed, it is a very good way to relax

2f5904e7d3c72e2c.voiceContent: I am Albedo, Chief Alchemist of the Knights of Favonius. You carry the aura of the stars, interesting... I would like to study you, if you do not mind. I'm certain we will have many opportunities to be alone in the future

311eed515b74c0e6.voiceContent: Good morning. Are we going to search for ancient relics today

320a626b5ea64398.voiceContent: Okay, let's pause here. I have to go back to work shortly, anyway

3794087748c41758.voiceContent: The time required to sketch portraits closely correlates with one's mood. I could spend half a day sketching Huffman, while I might only need three strokes of the pencil to sketch Kaeya â€” one for the face, one for the eyepatch string... and one for the eyepatch

3e2f6af363d9689e.voiceContent: What a view... How about a quick break so I can sketch this beautiful scenery

3f589f050e5a2e40.voiceContent: Going out into the world and investigating, turning the unknown into the known. ...Ahhh, I missed this feeling

4530002876186893.voiceContent: My Vision? Ah, that's nothing more than a tool to aid in my experiments, no different from a beaker or crucible. The one thing about it that really intrigues me is the principle behind how it works... One day, I will uncover its secrets. It's only a matter of time

47b0c59117f3fb23.voiceContent: Jean? She has served exceptionally well as Acting Grand Master. One can even say she is more reliable than Grand Master Varka. Perhaps in our hearts, we all eagerly await the day she can become the official Grand Master herself

4a3a088d4b6b5b1b.voiceContent: It's rather lively here. I wonder why people like card games so much..

4c7334663bfb1876.voiceContent: Have a question for me? Go ahead, ask. It doesn't take too long to ask a single question, does it? I'm about to begin the final stage of an experiment..

4ef21054e71dc0a5.voiceContent: I really do enjoy having dessert. How can I put it...? When both physical and mental capacity are spent, high-energy materials further provide a kind of primordial, highly-effective boost

62575af44792ac3c.voiceContent: Congratulations on your victory. It seems I must re-evaluate my deck

6509a5d2c0220106.voiceContent: Indeed, I view Klee as my younger sister. Whenever she gets herself into some explosive sort of trouble, I can only console myself with the fact that her current destructiveness is nothing compared to that of Miss Alice

67e8294b8e99e55c.voiceContent: Citrinitas is the final stage of the alchemical transmutation process. The meaning of the object being transmuted has finally been brought to light, becoming gold and revealing its true value... I too have found my own meaning

6912155d391be37e.voiceContent: Albedo is the step in which change begins. Clearing away the excess so we can take on all the knowledge that is available. Would you like to investigate this world with me

69593f600ae8a2d9.voiceContent: You... want to accompany me while I experiment? I'm honored.Oh, don't be nervous. My experiments may be dangerous, but no one gets hurt... most of the time

7384950685293ac7.voiceContent: What food do I dislike? ...Large portions of meat at restaurants. I have a rather small appetite, so a meal like that only ends up in tragedy â€” either I overeat and the joy of the taste is lost, or I don't finish it and the food is wasted. I decided to simply not go to restaurants, although that has also meant I must spend more time preparing my own food..

73e08d0769b0c44b.voiceContent: Genius? ...A number of people call me that. But I don't think I'm any genius.

750c0a609fd05684.voiceContent: There's something I've always wanted to ask you, but feared rejection and disappointment...Ahem... I am very interested in your... little floating companion. May I borrow her to investigate for a short while

76d2928a719215c4.voiceContent: Good night, you go ahead and rest. I will just finish one last experiment before bed... If you are interested in the results, I can discuss them with you tomorrow

76e35ade2e9394be.voiceContent: This is more than I can manage... maybe we could split it between us

7d3d7a023a2b98e2.voiceContent: Working with Sucrose on alchemy research is quite pleasant, but she has some... stubborn qualities in regards to certain aspects unrelated to research. For example, I have told her numerous times to just call me Albedo since we are hardly generations apart, but she insists on addressing me in an excessively formal manner. *sigh* ...Whatever she prefers, I guess

7fd21cd733dc826a.voiceContent: Family? Although Alice has always asked me to call her Mother, when I think of the idea of family, my master comes to mind first. My earliest memories in life are of going on adventures with her. She taught me the art of alchemy and much knowledge about the world. Perhaps... even the words family and master are incapable of fully expressing her meaning to me

801b828bb21ebf4f.voiceContent: Good, that went as I expected. On to my next objective..

8263594b214fbfe7.voiceContent: There's just never enough time, is there? Even when I remove the most troublesome matters from my schedule, I still can't find enough time for everything

84499fc3dc411518.voiceContent: If flavors were colors... this one would be gold

8ab4f9e1ea7881c2.voiceContent: If flavors were colors... this one would be gold

8f0ff088d153944c.voiceContent: This is more than I can manage... maybe we could split it between us

986a78fb926ca241.voiceContent: The truth of this world... *sigh* What could it be

9aa9fc4011e560b9.voiceContent: Sure enough, this was no challenge for you

9b76a4455812e9c2.voiceContent: Even now, I find the nigredo processing stage of alchemy passed down by my master to be full of mystery. What did my master want to create using this technique...? My research is far from over. I will require your help to investigate further

9f2538d5a0a60778.voiceContent: Lisa? I always am impressed by the valuable perspectives she brings to discussions. But is a person with her talents satisfied with such a basic occupation as librarian? There must be some hidden reason for this

a5f32fb671e47360.voiceContent: Well played. I must say that this was quite therapeutic

aebad1bad71c2d75.voiceContent: Relationships are... *sigh* quite troublesome. Once you establish a relation with someone, you must continue to maintain it; if you lose contact, you must reestablish the relation. This taxing cycle requires...a lot of time

b3ca4845aefa7e73.voiceContent: Happy birthday. You look especially happy, would you mind if I sketched you? The capacity of our brains is limited, so we are bound to forget things. But when an image is transferred onto paper or canvas, the sketch becomes an extension of our memory. We can remember that past feeling when we later look at the sketch

b951626f056434d9.voiceContent: Oh, by the way. Did you know that without human manipulation, you would need to harness the power of a sun eight times the size of our own in order to naturally create gold

c0d2b4a3c9b8a308.voiceContent: Having spectated a few matches, I have a few theories that I'd like to test out... I suppose this is my chance

c2243753bd2ed107.voiceContent: Rubedo in alchemy refers to the refining of feeling. I feel the refining of my own emotions is also thanks to you

c34d236567af1c21.voiceContent: Nigredo is the first step in alchemy, drawing from primordial forms. As beings who live in this world, we must find our own meaning

cfd2285f11f24ee2.voiceContent: You would like to know more about petrified trees? Um... ahem. Actually, the petrified trees you have come across in domains aren't that ancient. Truly ancient trees usually grow to around one or two miles in height? Oh, and there's a kind of large spider that lives around their roots â€” if you tie one up in cape jasmine and lemongrass and sprinkle on some cardamom, smoke it for a few hours â€” you get a fragrant taste that's simply... unforgettable

d112d354f7bfa366.voiceContent: Ample light... active biological organisms... Yes, this is a good place to sketch

d798f193f74e3722.voiceContent: Good afternoon. I heard your footsteps. My, it certainly is lively outside of the workshop

d7af980a68ee2f05.voiceContent: Sucrose? I think I more or less understand why she is so dedicated to her research in bio-alchemy... Either way, I'm happy to see her succeed more and more in her endeavors

d83530303daaf23f.voiceContent: If you wish, let's have a match

df8dcaae5a662d31.voiceContent: Ashes to ashes, dust to dust..

e13f3cdd6b8840cb.voiceContent: This is too dangerous for you

e3bcdad0bb75a4c8.voiceContent: You're willing to spend so much time on improving your cooking, and that's precisely how you're able to make it taste so good

f4be963bdc53158b.voiceContent: What do I do besides sketching and research...? I will occasionally read novels from Inazuma and Liyue. They contain many fascinating ideas which can sometimes provide me with unexpected inspirations for my own creations

f61da5639ff34e94.voiceContent: Would you oblige me by serving as my assistant? After observing so many experiments, you surely know a good deal about alchemy by now. Relax, we will work together. I don't think you will have any problems. I have faith in my ability to instruct you, and even more faith in your exceptional talents

f7ef715663c1d962.voiceContent: Although it's not gold, it certainly glitters

f91955680e43c934.voiceContent: This world holds many a rare treasure

fd9559ebaf58177e.voiceContent: Oh, Xingqiu? I find his written works quite interesting. The Yae Publishing House in Inazuma has been asking that I cooperate with a different author for greater royalties. Hmph, do I seem the type to be swayed by a few extra Mora

fe4cd8710f6d731e.voiceContent: Barbara? She's a very earnest Deaconess. I once had the opportunity to sketch her a simple portrait... What happened to the sketch? Ah yes... Albert offered to purchase it, but I rejected his bid and gave it to the Acting Grand Master. Social relations... really require a lot of effort

fe5e2093f57e9466.voiceContent: A challenge to my initial hypothesis... A surprise, yes, but a pleasant one
